42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Adiyy bin Hatim said:"I asked the Messenger of Allah: 'I release my dog, and I find another dog with mine, and I do not know which mine, and I do not know which of them caught (the game).' He said: 'do not eat it, for you said the name of Allah over your dog, but not over any other

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا وَجَدَ مَعَ كَلْبِهِ كَلْبًا غَيْرَهُ
chapter.eng-name: If He Finds Another Dog With His Dog
